body.name: Minthouz Battery Operated Clip on Fan - 8000mAh Rechargeable Portable Fan with LED Digital Display, 720° Rotation Small Desk Fan for Stroller Travel Camping Office Bedroom Outdoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 18 mins
features: 3-IN-1 Multi-function Fan: The portable clip fan can be used as a clip fan, desk fan, hanging fan. Equipped with one clip and a hook on the bottom, it can be clamped conveniently onto any surface or hung anywhere you need, making it suitable for more scenes.
Powerful Battery Capacity: This battery operated clip on fan comes equipped with an 8000mAh battery capacity that provides super long endurance, ensuring that you stay cool for 29 hours on end.

Durable & Portable: The grip clamp with soft rubber can clip on a surface up to 2 inches in thickness without leaving any trace. Features compact size of 3.3*6.1*8.3inches, compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry.

Super Quiet: This rechargeable clip desk fan is super quiet and super strong airflow. At the weak mode, the operating noise is as low as 20 decibels The quiet fan is equipped with a High-speed turbo motor that is powerful and quiet for stroller, bedroom, office, and home. This battery fan is perfect gift for friends and family.
LED Digital Display: Digital display of gear position and remaining power in real time and comes with a remote control for added convenience.
High Rotational Capability: The head of clip desk fan supports 360°horizontal and 360° vertical rotation to blow in any direction you desires.
Flexible 5-Gear Wind: 7~29 hours working time depend on different gears. The fifth gear provides a gentle, circulating breeze that can last up to 13 hours.

What You Get: All Minthouz products come with a high-quality after-sale service. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you have any questions, we will do our best to help you. 30-day money-back guarantee, 90-day warranty for replacing plus lifetime technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Minthouz 8000mAh 5-Speed Rechargeable Clip Fan with LED Digital Display First Gear Sleep wind mode --- About 29 hours Second Gear Natural wind mode --- About 17 hours Third Gear Cool wind mode --- About 12 hours Fourth Gear Strong wind mode --- About 7 hours Fifth Gear Circulating wind mode --- About 13 hours Charging Time About 10 hours (Green charging symbol flashes when charging. Full charge will be displayed at 100%.) LED Digital Display Display the gear and remaining power in real time and goes out after 10 seconds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i bought this to use over my patio heater instead of a ceiling fan but now i am using it everywhere. Great for the bathroom, cooling one person on the couch without freezing out the other person, or in the kitchen. also good for your bedside table since the battery life is so long. my need was for the clamp to be wide enough: strong and will clamp firmly up to 2 inches wide. very worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had it 2 weeks now and I can say I don't regret the purchase. The battery life is amazing and it came out of the box already fully charged, it lasted a really long time, I've only charged it once since. Must say its a little bulky to travel around with but worth it if I can get some relief from this summer heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Vesatile Unit
reviews.reviewText: This is a strong unit that is effective and works well for one person on a desk or a bed.The clip is an added advantage, but it slips some times on thinner posts.

reviews.reviewerName: Me encantó, super útil, excelente calidad
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excelente compra, buena fuerza, le dura muchísimo la bateria

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little fan
reviews.reviewText: With the weather getting warmer, I got this for a good nights sleep. I attached to a bookshelf in my bedroom and pointed where I wanted the breeze to blow. I love the separate button to control and the breeze at level 4 is strong enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long battery life and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Well build works great great seller honest would buy again thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works amazing, pushes a lot of air, can recharge from a solar panel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for dorm room
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has this in her dorm room and says she uses it daily. As a dad, I could see how this would be very useful when camping, boating, at the beach, tailgating, etc. the fan is great and works as advertised.
